product_name: Patagonia Gamut Long-Sleeve Shirt - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Whether worn alone on cool spring runs or as a base layer on colder days, the Patagonia Gamut long-sleeve shirt offers breathable coverage that lets you make time on the trail in total comfort. Soft, stretchy polyester/spandex fabric blend wicks moisture away and dries quickly; perfect for running, hiking or other aerobic activity. Mesh paneling on back and sleeves increases breathability and moisture transfer. Integrated UPF 25 sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays, keeping your skin safe no matter how long your day lasts. Gladiodor(R) helps control odor even after multiple wears, perfect for camping, traveling or backpacking. Patagonia Gamut long-sleeve shirt offers a slim fit, and is tagless and virtually seam-free for smooth, non-chafing comfort. Closeout.
short_description: Whether worn alone on cool spring runs or as a base layer on colder days, the Patagonia Gamut long-sleeve shirt offers breathable coverage that lets you make time on the trail in total comfort.
